verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*, \w that|strong="G4100"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w together|strong="G1722"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w that|strong="G4100"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w very|strong="G0846"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w did|strong="G1525"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* unbelieving \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w stirred|strong="G1892"\w* up \w and|strong="G2532"\w* incensed \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w minds|strong="G5590"\w* \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1096"\w* \w long|strong="G5550"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* abode \w there|strong="G1096"\w*, \w dealing|strong="G1325"\w* confidently \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w granting|strong="G1325"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G4172"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w divided|strong="G4977"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G4172"\w* \w them|strong="G1510"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* held \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* assault \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1438"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* use \w them|strong="G0846"\w* contumeliously, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w stone|strong="G3036"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* understanding \w it|strong="G2532"\w*, \w fled|strong="G2703"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Derbe|strong="G1191"\w*, \w cities|strong="G4172"\w* \w of|strong="G4172"\w* \w Lycaonia|strong="G3071"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* whole \w country|strong="G4066"\w* round \w about|strong="G1519"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* there preaching \w the|strong="G3588"\w* gospel.

\w And|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G2546"\w* sat \w a|strong="G1510"\w* certain man at Lystra, impotent \w in|strong="G1510"\w* his feet, \w a|strong="G1510"\w* cripple \w from|strong="G1510"\w* his motherâ€™s womb, \w who|strong="G1510"\w* never \w had|strong="G1510"\w* walked.

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* heard \w Paul|strong="G0846"\w* speaking. \w Who|strong="G3739"\w* looking \w upon|strong="G2521"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* seeing \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w faith|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* healed,

\w Said|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* loud voice: Stand upright \w on|strong="G0846"\w* thy feet. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* leaped up, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* walked.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* multitudes \w had|strong="G3588"\w* seen \w what|strong="G3588"\w* Paul \w had|strong="G3588"\w* done, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* lifted \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Lycaonian tongue, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* gods \w are|strong="G3588"\w* come down \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* likeness \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w men|strong="G3173"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2316"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* Barnabas, Jupiter: \w but|strong="G2316"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, Mercury; \w because|strong="G4314"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* chief speaker.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* priest \w also|strong="G5037"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* Jupiter \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G0846"\w*, bringing oxen \w and|strong="G1161"\w* garlands \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* gate, \w would|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* offered sacrifice \w with|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Which|strong="G3588"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* apostles Barnabas \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G1510"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* heard, rending \w their|strong="G2532"\w* clothes, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* leaped \w out|strong="G1510"\w* \w among|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, crying,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* saying: Ye \w men|strong="G0846"\w*, why \w do|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w*? \w We|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* mortals, \w men|strong="G0846"\w* \w like|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w you|strong="G2532"\w*, preaching \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* converted \w from|strong="G0191"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* vain \w things|strong="G0846"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* living \w God|strong="G0846"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* made \w the|strong="G3588"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* earth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* sea, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G0191"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* times past suffered \w all|strong="G3956"\w* nations \w to|strong="G3004"\w* walk \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* ways.

Nevertheless \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w left|strong="G1439"\w* \w not|strong="G3739"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* without testimony, doing good \w from|strong="G1722"\w* heaven, giving rains \w and|strong="G4198"\w* fruitful seasons, filling \w our|strong="G3956"\w* hearts \w with|strong="G1722"\w* food \w and|strong="G4198"\w* gladness.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* speaking \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* scarce restrained \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* sacrificing \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G2532"\w* there came thither certain Jews \w from|strong="G3361"\w* Antioch, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Iconium: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* persuading \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* stoning \w Paul|strong="G0846"\w*, drew \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G0846"\w*, thinking \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* dead.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* disciples stood round \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* rose up \w and|strong="G2532"\w* entered \w into|strong="G2453"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* next day \w he|strong="G2532"\w* departed \w with|strong="G0575"\w* Barnabas \w to|strong="G2532"\w* Derbe.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* preached \w the|strong="G3588"\w* gospel \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* taught many, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w returned|strong="G1525"\w* \w again|strong="G0450"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Lystra, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Iconium, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Antioch:

Confirming \w the|strong="G3588"\w* souls \w of|strong="G4172"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* exhorting \w them|strong="G1565"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w continue|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* faith: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* through \w many|strong="G2425"\w* tribulations \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G3588"\w* enter \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="G4172"\w* God.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* ordained \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3870"\w* priests \w in|strong="G1519"\w* every church, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* prayed \w with|strong="G1223"\w* fasting, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* commended \w them|strong="G3870"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* believed.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* passing \w through|strong="G2596"\w* Pisidia, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* came \w into|strong="G1519"\w* Pamphylia.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* having spoken \w the|strong="G3588"\w* word \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Lord \w in|strong="G1519"\w* Perge, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* down \w into|strong="G1519"\w* Attalia:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* thence \w they|strong="G2532"\w* sailed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Antioch, \w from|strong="G2597"\w* whence \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* delivered \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* grace \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2980"\w*, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* work \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* accomplished.

\w And|strong="G2316"\w* \w when|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* assembled \w the|strong="G3588"\w* church, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* related \w what|strong="G3739"\w* great \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w done|strong="G2041"\w* \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w them|strong="G3739"\w*, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* how \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* opened \w the|strong="G3588"\w* door \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w faith|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Gentiles.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* abode no small time \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* disciples.
